channel.title: [317- DELTA] Bones on altar | Rep++
channel.description:
Anyone know how to make it so if I click my bone, then on the altar it asks how many bones you wish to sacrifice? i.e.
How many bones would you like to sacrifice? 10 Bones 20 Bones X Bones
317 DELTA Will rep++ for any help!
